title: BRIEF-Faes Farma buys Laboratorios Diafarm, invests 70 mln euros
author: Reuters Staff
description: * SIGNS DEAL TO BUY 100 PERCENT OF LABORATORIOS DIAFARM SA, WITH INVESTMENT OF 70 MILLION EUROS
cleaned_text: June 9 (Reuters) - FAES FARMA SA: * SIGNS DEAL TO BUY 100 PERCENT OF LABORATORIOS DIAFARM SA, WITH INVESTMENT OF 70 MILLION EUROS * THE ACQUISITION WILL BE FINANCED WITH GROUP'S OWN RESOURCES AND BANK FINANCING Source text Eikon: Further company coverage:
